name: M-Plan
description: An exploration, but not amazing game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 32/64-bit / Vista 32/64 / XP Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750ti 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 32/64-bit / Vista 32/64 / XP Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
